comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of tables set up at table 1
- y: number of tables set up at table 2

Definitions:
- x, y: non-negative integers representing the number of tables set up at each table

Extracted Constraints:
- 3x + 8y \leq 100 (Powder constraint)
- 5x + 6y \leq 90 (Glue constraint)
- 2x + 4y \leq 30 (Mess constraint)
- x \geq 0
- y \geq 0

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize 4x + 5y (Amount of slime produced)
